name: Tennis Pro Tournament
description:
*** Half price for a limited time ***

Finally a realistic high-quality tennis game for Apple TV! Tennis Pro Tournament combines wonderful graphics and intuitive ball control with fun and realistic gaming. Play a single match or try to win the whole tournament.

Tennis Pro Tournament is the worldwide #1 Tennis game for Apple TV.

Put on your headband and have some fun!

Please email any feedback to tennis@inlovewith.com we will reply to everything.
